alert.note: Alert for Shelby (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 5:39PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Shelby County through 615 PM CDT... At 539 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Maylene, or near Alabaster. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alabaster, Helena, Calera, Montevallo, Wilton, American Village, University Of Montevallo, Maylene, Shelby County Airport, Siluria, Alabaster Veterans Park, Saginaw and Dogwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
